name: Outsider (Serendevity)
description:
Submission for the Weekly Game Jam #117

Outsider is the story of a spider that grew up in an ant colony and it's bullied because it is not a bug (technically, bugs are insects and a spider is not...).
It all changes when, suddenly the ant colony is attacked...

Controls:
Movement - wasd
Jumo - space
Spider web - mouse to aim and left click to attach and detach.
